Reviews.Title: Very very good service from Mimogram
Reviews.Author: K. Chapman
Reviews.Content: I came across this 4 pack cleaning cloth during my search of cleaning cloths. Even though all the features all seemed pretty nice to me, but i still gave it a second thought because it was a newly launched product.I emailed Mimogram for some questions and less than an hour later, i got a response from them answering all my questions in detailed. Mimogram was very patient and friendly and went through my questions one by one in no time. I was very impressed and pleased with their customer service. Many of the companies found here have no interest in the customer experience and just want to squeeze out their money. Therefore i went to place my order right away.And of course besides the awesome customer service they have, their product certainly served their name as well. I have been 100% satisfied with it since day one.  And i am sure i will continue to be satisfied.
